name: magnet-pull
description: While this Pokémon is in battle, opposing steel-type Pokémon cannot flee or switch out.  Pokémon with run away can still flee.  Pokémon can still switch out with the use of a move or item.  Overworld: If the lead Pokémon has this ability, Steel-type Pokémon have a higher encounter rate.
short_description: Prevents steel opponents from fleeing or switching out.
